body.raw:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>
<wps:Execute service="WPS" version="1.0.0" xmlns:wps="http://www.opengis.net/wps/1.0.0" xmlns:ows="http://www.opengis.net/ows/1.1" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.opengis.net/wps/1.0.0 ../wpsExecute_request.xsd">
	<ows:Identifier>viewshed</ows:Identifier>

   <wps:ResponseForm>
        <wps:RawDataOutput>
          <ows:Identifier>output</ows:Identifier>
        </wps:RawDataOutput>
    </wps:ResponseForm>

	<wps:DataInputs>

		<wps:Input>
            <ows:Identifier>of</ows:Identifier>
            <wps:Data>
                <wps:LiteralData>czml</wps:LiteralData>
            </wps:Data>
		</wps:Input>

        <wps:Input>
            <ows:Identifier>ox</ows:Identifier>
            <wps:Data>
                <wps:LiteralData>35.11</wps:LiteralData>
            </wps:Data>
        </wps:Input>
        <wps:Input>
            <ows:Identifier>oy</ows:Identifier>
            <wps:Data>
                <wps:LiteralData>32.06</wps:LiteralData>
            </wps:Data>
        </wps:Input>

        <wps:Input>
            <ows:Identifier>oz</ows:Identifier>
            <wps:Data>
                <wps:LiteralData>10</wps:LiteralData>
            </wps:Data>
        </wps:Input>

        <wps:Input>
            <ows:Identifier>tz</ows:Identifier>
            <wps:Data>
                <wps:LiteralData>10</wps:LiteralData>
            </wps:Data>
        </wps:Input>

        <wps:Input>
            <ows:Identifier>max_r</ows:Identifier>
            <wps:Data>
                <wps:LiteralData>2000</wps:LiteralData>
            </wps:Data>
        </wps:Input>
        
        <wps:Input>
            <ows:Identifier>o</ows:Identifier>
            <wps:Data>
                <wps:LiteralData>count</wps:LiteralData>
            </wps:Data>
        </wps:Input>

       <wps:Input>
            <ows:Identifier>h_aperture</ows:Identifier>
            <wps:Data>
                <wps:LiteralData>180</wps:LiteralData>
            </wps:Data>
        </wps:Input>
        
       <wps:Input>
            <ows:Identifier>h_aperture</ows:Identifier>
            <wps:Data>
                <wps:LiteralData>90</wps:LiteralData>
            </wps:Data>
        </wps:Input>
        
        
       <wps:Input>
            <ows:Identifier>h_aperture</ows:Identifier>
            <wps:Data>
                <wps:LiteralData>60</wps:LiteralData>
            </wps:Data>
        </wps:Input>
        
        
        <wps:Input>
            <ows:Identifier>azimuth</ows:Identifier>
            <wps:Data>
                <wps:LiteralData>20</wps:LiteralData>
            </wps:Data>
        </wps:Input>
		
        <wps:Input>
            <ows:Identifier>azimuth</ows:Identifier>
            <wps:Data>
                <wps:LiteralData>60</wps:LiteralData>
            </wps:Data>
        </wps:Input>

		<wps:Input>
            <ows:Identifier>color_palette</ows:Identifier>
                <wps:Reference xlink:href="file:./data/sample/color_files/viewshed/count.txt"/>
		</wps:Input>

        <wps:Input>
            <ows:Identifier>cutline</ows:Identifier>
            <wps:Data>
                <wps:ComplexData>

                    <ogr:FeatureCollection
                         xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
                         xsi:schemaLocation="http://ogr.maptools.org/ comb_poly.xsd"
                         xmlns:ogr="http://ogr.maptools.org/"
                         xmlns:gml="http://www.opengis.net/gml">
                      <gml:boundedBy>
                        <gml:Box>
                          <gml:coord><gml:X>35.09942551535836</gml:X><gml:Y>32.04549480546075</gml:Y></gml:coord>
                          <gml:coord><gml:X>35.13428943344709</gml:X><gml:Y>32.08511289419796</gml:Y></gml:coord>
                        </gml:Box>
                      </gml:boundedBy>

                      <gml:featureMember>
                        <ogr:comb_poly fid="comb_poly.0">
                          <ogr:geometryProperty><gml:Polygon srsName="EPSG:4326"><gml:outerBoundaryIs><gml:LinearRing><gml:coordinates>35.0994255153584,32.0752600477816 35.1185110989761,32.085112894198 35.1342894334471,32.0604463276451 35.1003901296928,32.0454948054607 35.0994255153584,32.0752600477816</gml:coordinates></gml:LinearRing></gml:outerBoundaryIs></gml:Polygon></ogr:geometryProperty>
                        </ogr:comb_poly>
                      </gml:featureMember>
                    </ogr:FeatureCollection>


                </wps:ComplexData>
            </wps:Data>
		</wps:Input>

	</wps:DataInputs>
</wps:Execute>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>
<wps:Execute service="WPS" version="1.0.0" xmlns:wps="http://www.opengis.net/wps/1.0.0" xmlns:ows="http://www.opengis.net/ows/1.1" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.opengis.net/wps/1.0.0 ../wpsExecute_request.xsd">
	<ows:Identifier>viewshed</ows:Identifier>

   <wps:ResponseForm>
        <wps:RawDataOutput>
          <ows:Identifier>output</ows:Identifier>
        </wps:RawDataOutput>
    </wps:ResponseForm>

	<wps:DataInputs>

		<wps:Input>
            <ows:Identifier>of</ows:Identifier>
            <wps:Data>
                <wps:LiteralData>czml</wps:LiteralData>
            </wps:Data>
		</wps:Input>

        <wps:Input>
            <ows:Identifier>ox</ows:Identifier>
            <wps:Data>
                <wps:LiteralData>35.11</wps:LiteralData>
            </wps:Data>
        </wps:Input>
        <wps:Input>
            <ows:Identifier>oy</ows:Identifier>
            <wps:Data>
                <wps:LiteralData>32.06</wps:LiteralData>
            </wps:Data>
        </wps:Input>

        <wps:Input>
            <ows:Identifier>oz</ows:Identifier>
            <wps:Data>
                <wps:LiteralData>10</wps:LiteralData>
            </wps:Data>
        </wps:Input>

        <wps:Input>
            <ows:Identifier>tz</ows:Identifier>
            <wps:Data>
                <wps:LiteralData>10</wps:LiteralData>
            </wps:Data>
        </wps:Input>

        <wps:Input>
            <ows:Identifier>max_r</ows:Identifier>
            <wps:Data>
                <wps:LiteralData>2000</wps:LiteralData>
            </wps:Data>
        </wps:Input>


		<wps:Input>
            <ows:Identifier>color_palette</ows:Identifier>
                <wps:Reference xlink:href="file:./data/sample/color_files/viewshed/viewshed.txt"/>
		</wps:Input>

        <wps:Input>
            <ows:Identifier>cutline</ows:Identifier>
            <wps:Data>
                <wps:ComplexData>

                    <ogr:FeatureCollection
                         xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
                         xsi:schemaLocation="http://ogr.maptools.org/ comb_poly.xsd"
                         xmlns:ogr="http://ogr.maptools.org/"
                         xmlns:gml="http://www.opengis.net/gml">
                      <gml:boundedBy>
                        <gml:Box>
                          <gml:coord><gml:X>35.09942551535836</gml:X><gml:Y>32.04549480546075</gml:Y></gml:coord>
                          <gml:coord><gml:X>35.13428943344709</gml:X><gml:Y>32.08511289419796</gml:Y></gml:coord>
                        </gml:Box>
                      </gml:boundedBy>

                      <gml:featureMember>
                        <ogr:comb_poly fid="comb_poly.0">
                          <ogr:geometryProperty><gml:Polygon srsName="EPSG:4326"><gml:outerBoundaryIs><gml:LinearRing><gml:coordinates>35.0994255153584,32.0752600477816 35.1185110989761,32.085112894198 35.1342894334471,32.0604463276451 35.1003901296928,32.0454948054607 35.0994255153584,32.0752600477816</gml:coordinates></gml:LinearRing></gml:outerBoundaryIs></gml:Polygon></ogr:geometryProperty>
                        </ogr:comb_poly>
                      </gml:featureMember>
                    </ogr:FeatureCollection>


                </wps:ComplexData>
            </wps:Data>
		</wps:Input>

	</wps:DataInputs>
</wps:Execute>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>
<wps:Execute service="WPS" version="1.0.0" xmlns:wps="http://www.opengis.net/wps/1.0.0" xmlns:ows="http://www.opengis.net/ows/1.1" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.opengis.net/wps/1.0.0 ../wpsExecute_request.xsd">
	<ows:Identifier>crop_color</ows:Identifier>

    <wps:ResponseForm>
        <wps:RawDataOutput>
          <ows:Identifier>czml</ows:Identifier>
        </wps:RawDataOutput>
    </wps:ResponseForm>

    <wps:DataInputs>

		<wps:Input>
            <ows:Identifier>output_tif</ows:Identifier>
            <wps:Data>
                <wps:LiteralData>False</wps:LiteralData>
            </wps:Data>
		</wps:Input>

        <wps:Input>
            <ows:Identifier>output_czml</ows:Identifier>
            <wps:Data>
                <wps:LiteralData>True</wps:LiteralData>
            </wps:Data>
		</wps:Input>

<!--		<wps:Input>-->
<!--            <ows:Identifier>extent</ows:Identifier>-->
<!--            <wps:Data>-->
<!--                <wps:BoundingBoxData crs="EPSG:4326" dimenstions="2">-->
<!--                    <ows:LowerCorner>35.0 31.5</ows:LowerCorner>-->
<!--                    <ows:UpperCorner>35.1 31.6</ows:UpperCorner>-->
<!--                </wps:BoundingBoxData>-->
<!--            </wps:Data>-->
<!--		</wps:Input>-->

		<wps:Input>
            <ows:Identifier>extent</ows:Identifier>
            <wps:Data>
                <wps:BoundingBoxData crs="EPSG:4326" dimenstions="2">
                    <ows:LowerCorner>35.2 32.6</ows:LowerCorner>
                    <ows:UpperCorner>35.3 32.7</ows:UpperCorner>
<!--                    <ows:LowerCorner>-180.0 -90.0</ows:LowerCorner>-->
<!--                    <ows:UpperCorner>180.0 90.0</ows:UpperCorner>-->
                </wps:BoundingBoxData>
            </wps:Data>
		</wps:Input>

        <wps:Input>
            <ows:Identifier>cutline</ows:Identifier>
            <wps:Data>
                <wps:ComplexData>

                    <ogr:FeatureCollection
                         xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
                         xsi:schemaLocation="http://ogr.maptools.org/ poly.xsd"
                         xmlns:ogr="http://ogr.maptools.org/"
                         xmlns:gml="http://www.opengis.net/gml">
                      <gml:boundedBy>
                        <gml:Box>
                          <gml:coord><gml:X>35.15711864406779</gml:X><gml:Y>32.52847457627119</gml:Y></gml:coord>
                          <gml:coord><gml:X>35.45135593220338</gml:X><gml:Y>32.78237288135593</gml:Y></gml:coord>
                        </gml:Box>
                      </gml:boundedBy>

                      <gml:featureMember>
                        <ogr:poly fid="poly.0">
                          <ogr:geometryProperty><gml:Polygon srsName="EPSG:4326"><gml:outerBoundaryIs><gml:LinearRing><gml:coordinates>35.1571186440678,32.6708474576271 35.2864406779661,32.7823728813559 35.4513559322034,32.6471186440678 35.3338983050847,32.6115254237288 35.1571186440678,32.6708474576271</gml:coordinates></gml:LinearRing></gml:outerBoundaryIs></gml:Polygon></ogr:geometryProperty>
                          <ogr:id xsi:nil="true"/>
                        </ogr:poly>
                      </gml:featureMember>
                      <gml:featureMember>
                        <ogr:poly fid="poly.1">
                          <ogr:geometryProperty><gml:Polygon srsName="EPSG:4326"><gml:outerBoundaryIs><gml:LinearRing><gml:coordinates>35.1666101694915,32.5913559322034 35.2733898305085,32.606779661017 35.2710169491525,32.536779661017 35.185593220339,32.5284745762712 35.1666101694915,32.5913559322034</gml:coordinates></gml:LinearRing></gml:outerBoundaryIs></gml:Polygon></ogr:geometryProperty>
                          <ogr:id xsi:nil="true"/>
                        </ogr:poly>
                      </gml:featureMember>
                    </ogr:FeatureCollection>

                </wps:ComplexData>
            </wps:Data>
		</wps:Input>

		<wps:Input>
            <ows:Identifier>color_palette</ows:Identifier>
            <wps:Data>
                <wps:ComplexData>
                    100% 255 255 255 

                    75% 235 220 175 

                    20% 190 185 135 

                    0% 240 250 150 

                    nv  0 0 0 0
                </wps:ComplexData>
<!--                <wps:ComplexData>-->
<!--                    500 255 255 255 
-->
<!--                    450 235 220 175 
-->
<!--                    300 190 185 135 
-->
<!--                    150 240 250 150 
-->
<!--                    76  50  180  50 
-->
<!--                    75  200 230 255 
-->
<!--                    nv  0 0 0 0-->
<!--                </wps:ComplexData>-->
            </wps:Data>
		</wps:Input>

	</wps:DataInputs>
</wps:Execute>
